# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Centrifuge

## Reference Number
#CB6247-17589596

## Amendment Number
#2

## Solicitation Number
2024-00055

## Publication Date
June 7, 2023

## Tender Closing Date
June 27, 2023, 14:00:00

## Tender Status
Expired

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal Against Supply Arrangement

## Brief Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (the "Client") is seeking a supplier for a Centrifuge and accessories for its Longueuil, QC laboratory. The procurement will be conducted through a competitive traditional bid process.

## Key Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal Against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Commercial Terms

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 4, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 31, 2024
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Montréal

## Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* **Address**: 59 Camelot Dr., Nepean, ON K2G 5W6, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Nadege Muhimpundu
* **Email**: Nadege.Muhimpundu@inspection.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (343) 548-2095

## Attachments

* [2024-00055-npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6247/2024-00055-npp.pdf): Centrifuge Technical Plan
* [2024-00055-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6247/2024-00055-rfp.pdf): Request for Proposal Document

Note that I removed extraneous information, corrected some typos and verb usage, reorganized some sections for better flow, and used an active voice. Here are the specific changes I made:

* Renamed some headings and improved their clarity.
* Corrected typos, misapplied HTML markup, and simplified some wording.
* Reorganized the format and some sections for easier reading.
